about.details:
Hariom Pipe Industries Limited manufactures iron and steel products including Mild Steel (MS) Pipes, Scaffolding, HR Strips, MS Billets, and Sponge Iron. The company sells and markets MS Pipes in the western and southern parts of India under the brand name "Hariom Pipes". As part of the B2B sales, the company sells MS Pipes and Scaffoldings to specific developers and contractors. Hariom Pipe Industries has more than 200 dealers and distributors for selling its products. The company is located in Hyderabad, Telangana.

The company operates two plants, one at Mahabubnagar District in Telangana (Unit I) that manufactures finished steel products from iron scrap and sponge iron and the second plant at Anantapur District, Andhra Pradesh (Unit II) that only manufactures Sponge Iron.

Hariom Pipe Industries has more than 200 employees, 1400 plus Retailers distribution network, 150 plus manufacturing specifications, and a total of 300832 MT manufacturing capacity.

Competitive Strengths:

  1. Integrated nature of our operations.
  2. Environment-friendly manufacturing process.
  3. The strategic location of manufacturing Units.
  4. Cost advantage in manufacturing our products.
  5. Competitive pricing of our products.
  6. Experienced & Qualified Team.

faqs.question: What is the Hariom Pipe Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Hariom Pipe Industries IPO is a main-board IPO of 8500000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹130.05 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹153 per share. The minimum order quantity is 98.

The IPO opens on March 30, 2022, and closes on April 5, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Hariom Pipe Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Hariom Pipe Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Hariom Pipe Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Hariom Pipe Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Hariom Pipe Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Hariom Pipe Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Hariom Pipe Industries IPO opens on March 30, 2022 and closes on April 5, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Hariom Pipe Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Hariom Pipe Industries IPO lot size is 98, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,994.

faqs.question: How to apply for Hariom Pipe Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Hariom Pipe Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Hariom Pipe Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Hariom Pipe Industries IPO will be done on Friday, April 8, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 12, 2022. Check the Hariom Pipe Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Hariom Pipe Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Hariom Pipe Industries IPO listing date is on Wednesday, April 13, 2022.
